title: Supply Is Manageable for Spreads: BNP's Robson
description: On "Bloomberg Real Yield", Meghan Robson, head of US credit strategy at BNP Paribas, and Zachary Griffiths, head of US IG & macro strategy at CreditSights, speak with Scarlet Fu about the credit market. Global bond sales had their busiest ever start to a year. US high grade sales this week topped $90 billion and was the busiest week ever for a non-Covid year. (Source: Bloomberg)
